name: Exiled World
description:
‘Exiled World’ is a 2D platformer, where the player takes the role of a character named Val who is trapped in a world shrouded in darkness and neglected by humanity. This harsh and unforgiving environment is filled to the brim with dangerous flora which player has to avoid. Val armed with nothing but a lantern strives to traverse this world in search of something to end her descent into madness.

Arrow keys to move

Z key to jump (Press twice to perform a double jump)

Press Z while against a vertical wall to perform a wall jump

Left-Shift to dash (Use arrow keys to dash a specific direction)

Development Team:
